title: 3 Things I Learned from Failing
excerpt: Failure hurts. But it also teaches. Here are three lessons I’ve learned the hard way...
content:
Failure hurts. But it also teaches. Here are three lessons I’ve learned the hard way:

1. Always plan, but be ready to pivot.
2. People matter more than pride.
3. Failure isn’t the opposite of success — it’s part of it.
